title: An Arundel Tomb endless altered people

content.prompt: The metaphor implied in lines 29-31 (“And up . . . identity”) is best interpreted as assigning the “endless altered people” the qualities of a

choices.label: map guiding travelers to a destination
cemetery that has many empty tombs
deep well that provides fresh water

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe how textual details reveal nuances and complexities in characters' relationships with one another.
